mapper.select: SELECT da.* FROM devops_application da WHERE da.is_active AND da.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT da.`id`, da.`code`, da.`name` FROM devops_application da WHERE da.project_id = #{projectId} AND da.is_active = #{active} AND ((select count(1) from devops_app_market dam where da.id=dam.app_id)=0) AND ((select count(1) from devops_app_version dav where da.id=dav.app_id)>0)

SELECT da.id, da.project_id, da.name, da.code, da.is_active, da.is_synchro, da.gitlab_project_id, da.app_template_id, da.uuid, da.token, da.object_version_number FROM devops_application da WHERE da.token = #{token}

SELECT count( 1 ) FROM devops_application da WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM devops_app_market dam WHERE dam.app_id = da.id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM devops_app_instance dai JOIN devops_app_version dav ON dav.id = dai.app_version_id WHERE dav.app_id = da.id ) AND da.id = #{applicationId};
